feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA1/SGP1][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment version upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 29, 21:00 UTC  -  Nov 30, 00:00 UTC

Aug 24, 17:44 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 29/11/2023 21:00 UTC
End time : 30/11/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a version upgrade on multiple network equipment.

entry.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - End of Life Real Time Monitoring APIv6
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 7, 09:30 - 10:00 UTC

Sep 22, 11:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 07/11/2023 09:30 UTC
End time : 07/11/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : The End of Life of Real Time Monitoring (RTM) for baremetal is scheduled for the 7th of November 2023.
Few customers will be impacted (less than 10) and will stop be able to monitor their dedicated servers via the APIv6. This will impact APIv6 calls /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/statistics.

entry.title: [RBX4][Dedicated Servers] - 54B21
entry.content:
Oct 17, 00:49 UTC
Identified - Start time : 17/10/2023 00:40 UTC
Service impact : The public switch is currently unreachable.
Root cause : Network equipment issue.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are replacing the affected equipment.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - 41B10/41B13/41B14
entry.content:
Oct 15, 11:37 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 15, 08:27 UTC
Update - Start time : 15/10/2023 08:02 UTC
End time : 15/10/2023 08:21 UTC
Service impact : Services are working as they should be.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a power supply.

Oct 15, 08:24 UTC
Update - On racks 41B13, some servers and Public Network are still unreachable.

Oct 15, 08:22 UTC
Update - On racks 41B10 and 41B14, the situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.

Oct 15, 08:21 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Oct 15, 08:17 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 15/10/2023 08:02 UTC
Service impact : Servers are unreachable on these racks.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Root cause : A network equipment caused the incident
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently monitoring the situation

Oct 15, 03:25 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 15/10/2023 03:00 UTC
Service impact : A flap is being observed on public network of servers in rack 09B09
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - 46C21- 46C22
entry.content:
Oct 13, 23:03 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 13/10/2023 13:51 UTC
End time : 13/10/2023 22:48 UTC
Service impact : Some servers were temporarily unreachable in racks 46C21 and 46C22
Root cause : Due to a cooling system module failure.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 13, 21:31 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Servers in rack 46C22 are reachable again.
Our technical teams are still working on servers of the rack 46C21.
